Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PcAst-1b/c PcAst-1a (astacidin, natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, Pro-rich; PrAMPs, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Louisiana crawfish, Red Swamp Crayfish,Procambarus ClarkiiGirard 1852, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (64%) toPcAst-1a. GRAVY: -1.608; Mol formula C140H218N44O32;  Mol Wt 3042.548; 28% Pro.Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 2 uM), S. aureus c.i. (MIC 32 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 1 uM), E. coli c.i., A. baumannii ATCC 19606, and A. baumannii c.i. (MIC 2 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Roncevic T, cikeÅ¡-culic V, Maravic A, et al.2019, Italy, Europe
Literature Information.Title: Identification and Functional Characterization of the Astacidin Family of Proline-Rich Host Defence Peptides (PcAst) From the Red Swamp Crayfish (Procambarus Clarkii, Girard 1852)
